name: Mind Massaging Machine
description: Give your mind a relaxing massage or use a hypnosis session. The MMM uses modern technology to bring hypnosis into VR space, making the whole experience more intense and immersive, putting the user into a hypnotic trance like no software before it.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Atom Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Additional Notes: This configuration will not work with VR mode
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
